verses.1: Tua ciangin vanah lim lamdang lian khat hong kilang hi. Puan silh bangin ni silhin, a khe nuai ah kha omin, aksi sawm le nih a kisuanna lukhu, a lu tungah a khu numei khat om hi.
verses.2: Tua numei naupaii hi a, nausuah natna tung ta ahih manin na sa-in a kiko hi.
verses.3: Tua ciangin lim lamdang a dang khat mah vanah hong kilang leuleu hi. Gulpi san a lian mahmah khat om a, lutang sagih le ki sawm nei a, a lutang sagihte ah lukhu mah nei ciat hi.
verses.4: A mei tawh vanah a om aksi seh thum suah seh khat vat khia-in leilak a denna hi. A nau a suah phetin a ne pah dingin nausuak dingin a kithawi tua numeiʼ mai ah a ding hi.
verses.5: Tua ciangin tua numei in leitung minam khempeuh sik ciangkhut tawh a uk ding ta pasal khat hong nei hi. Ahi zongin tua naungek pen thakhatin kilakhia-in Pasian a tutna a tokhom ah a kipaipih hi.
verses.6: A numei pen Pasian in ama adingin a bawl kholhsakna mun gamlak ah tai a, tua munah ni tul khat za nih sawm guk sung kikhoi ding hi.
verses.7: Tu-in vantungah gal kidona hong om a, Mikhael le a vantung mite in gulpi le a vantung mite a do uh hi.
verses.8: Ahi zongin tua gulpi guallel ahih manin tua gulpi le a vantung mite, vantungah ki-omsak nawn lo hi.
verses.9: Tua ciangin tua tanglai gulpi, Dawimangpa ahih kei leh Satan a kici, leitung mi khempeuh a khem pa pen a vantung mite tawh leitungah kilawnsuk hi.
verses.10: Tua ciangin vantungah nakpi takin awging khat ka za a, “Tu-in Pasian in hong hon khia khinta a, kumpi vangliatna a neihna hong lak khia khinta a, ama Khris in aana a neihna thu lak khia khinta hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a sun a zanin eiteʼ Pasianʼ mai ah dingin i sanggamte mawhsakna a gen tawntung pa, tu-in vantung panin kilawn khia khinta hi.
verses.11: I sanggamte in Tuuno sisan le thuman a genna uh tawh amah na zo uh a, a nuntakna nangawn uh na pia ngam uh hi.
verses.12: Tua ahih manin vantungte le tuate sungah a teeng mi khempeuh aw, lungdam un! Ahi zongin vantung panin Dawimangpa hong kilawn khia suk a, hun tomno bek a nei lai ahih lam thei ahih manin leitung le tui tungah a omte adingin lauhuai mahmah ding hi,” hong ci hi.
verses.13: Gulpi in leitungah a kilawn khia khin ahih lam a kitheih ciangin ta pasal a nei nupi a delh dingin hong kithawi hi.
verses.14: Ahi zongin tua gulpi in a sukkhak theih loh nadingin kum thum le alang sung gamlak ah a kikep nading munah a leentheih nadingin muvanlai gol mahmahteʼ kha tawh a kibang kha nih tua numei a kiguan hi.
verses.15: Gulpi in zong tuikhang tawh tua numei a taihsak theih nadingin a kam panin gunpi luang bangin tua numeiʼ nungah tui a luangsak hi.
verses.16: Ahi zongin leitung in tua numei na huh a, gulpi kam panin a luang tuite a kam tawh na hup kang hi.
verses.17: Tua ciangin tua numei tungah gulpi heh mahmah a, tua numeiʼ suanlekhak dangte ahi, Pasianʼ thupiakna zui-in, Jesu thu ah kip takin a om mite a sim dingin kuan khia a,
verses.18: tuipi gei ah dingin a om hi.
